title: Xbox Game Showcase - Are We Hyped?
description:
Where is our hype level, and is Greg going to eat his words? 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x2PBbxN9HT0

Download Vampire Survivors on Switch, PC, Xbox, and Mobile RIGHT NOW! PlayStation coming soon!

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
